alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:56PM CDT until August 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR GOSPER...DAWSON AND WESTERN FURNAS COUNTIES... At 855 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Brady to 7 miles northeast of Stockville to 8 miles north of Herndon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Cozad, Gothenburg, Cambridge, Arapahoe, Elwood, Holbrook, Eddyville, Wilsonville, Smithfield, Hendley, Willow Island, Johnson Lake and Farnam. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 243. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
